task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions to use the subraction feature of the JPS calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.

context.p: Use this task to subtract two numbers using the subtraction feature of the JPS calculator.

taskbody.result: The result from the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example: If you want to subtract 2 from 3, the equation will look like 3-2=1. The result 1 appears on the screen.
